resources.string:
"This feature is only available for professional users !
You can be one of them now, it will just take a minute !"

" "" What is this application?
Lapse It make it easy to capture astonishing time-lapse videos right in your Android-powered device.

What happens when I receive a call or other app comes to front?
When you receive an important event like this, Android pauses the running app until you finish talking or coming back to it, when that happens, your capturing project is PAUSED, then when you return you can continue capturing.

Where the video files are stored?
Your videos are stored in a folder named rendered, you can find it inside your output folder.

How to use the Stop-Motion mode?
In the Capture View, before starting capturing, tap the second menu button from top to botton ( Usually Every XX secs ) and select Stop-Motion, doing that you can take your pictures manually.

I purchased the Pro version using in-app billing but it didn't changed anything !
Sometimes Google can delay the confirmation response, so if it don't change automatically, try restarting the app and if it doesn't work force close and clear the application cache, after that it should work, otherwise contact us.

Which are the rendering modes?
You can render your video in different formats like MP4, MOV or FLV, in different resolutions and with different frame rates, this gives you more control over the results you want.

I'm receiving the 'Video cannot be played' message when I try to watch my video !
Android video codecs sometimes vary in different devices, you will have to use a 3rd party video player like Rock Player.

Are there any restrictions in how long it can capture?
From the application perspective there are no restrictions, however, battery and disk space are limited.

Which resolutions are available?
In the Pro version you can render videos up to 1080p. Other resolutions available are 720p, 480p, 360p, 240p. In the free version only 240p is available. If you liked the app, please support us purchasing the Pro version.

How can I disable the camera shutter sound?
The shutter sound is disabled by default in Lapse It, unfortunately for privacy policy reasons, in some non-rooted phones it will not work. It you want to disable it you will probably have to root it.

The In-app Billing payment will be kept when I uninstall the app or change my device? It will work out of 3g areas?
The answer is yes for both questions, your payment will be stored in your Google Account, and everytime that you open the app from a fresh install it will check your previous orders in your Google account and will enable the options automatically, after activated the app will work in Professional mode anywhere.

Where are captured files stored?
In your sdcard/LapseIt directory.

How can I delete captured files?
Tap on List captured button and select the item that will be deleted and click delete and confirm.

What are the limitations of free version?
You can just capture at 240p.

How can I save battery and capture for a longer time?
If you can't have a power source attached to your device during the capture, the best practice is to close all the other applications, disable GPS and WiFi and reduce the screen brightness to the lowest level.

"" "

"Sorry, there's not enough memory to capture using the current settings, please use a lower resolution or close some opened apps and try again, if the error persists please contact us.
Thanks !"

"Sorry, there's not enough memory to render using the current settings, please use a lower resolution or close some opened apps and try again, if the error persists please contact us.
Thanks !"

"Knowing that Lapse It worth for it's users will give us an extra boost to keep coming with new features !
Would you like to give some stars to Lapse It?"

"It was not possible to establish a connection to the server !
Please check your signal, otherwise our server may be full, please try again later !"
Error initializing Camera, try closing all Camera apps or rebooting your device
Could not retrieve the specified music, please try a different file manager !

"Hi, just a reminder that in this mode you will capture and render images at 1920x1080.
That's still a heavy task for most devices, so take in consideration your device model and your needs, depending on many factors it may not work.
Thanks for using Lapse It Pro!"
Capture in Full Definition and more with Lapse It Pro, interested in more details?

" " Determine the capture resolution

Usually users will capture their images with the highest resolution as possible, but we provide a range from a lower to the highest one so it can attend your needs

Lower resolutions are good for capturing for longer times or for scenes that requiere fast interval between the shots ( as the system takes less time to process de image ), also they are ok if you will display only in mobile devices

Higher resolutions provide a more accurate image quality, bigger video size and requires mode disk space and rendering time

Full Sensor was add specially for those who want to capture in their devices but render in their computers, you still can render it using Lapse It, but it will be scaled to 720P

" "

" "Determine the capture resolution

Usually users will capture their images with the highest resolution as possible, but we provide a range from a lower to the highest one so it can attend your needs

 Lower resolutions are good for capturing for longer times and for displaying in mobile devices

 Higher resolutions provide a more accurate image quality and requires mode disk space and rendering time

 Lite version
We provide a free lite version of this app for testing purposes, in this version you can only capture time-lapses in a lower resolution

 If you like the app and think that it worth to pay for the developer work, tap this text get more information about the professional version. " "

" " Determine the time scale for the capture

This parameter will be used together with the \"Frame Interval\" to determine the timing between the pictures " "

" " Limit by Frame
In this mode you can determine the number of frames that will be captured, when it reach the number indicated, the capture will stop automatically.

Limit by Time
In this mode you can determine a maximum length of time to capture, when it reach the time indicated, the capture will stop automatically.

Limit by User
In this mode the capture will last until the user click on the stop button. " "

" " Determine if the application should request the geolocation information

With geolocation activated your project will have a map resource to track where your started and ended your time-lapse with the frames in between

This is useful in moving situations like a driving lapse or a free camera lapse " "

" " Determine the encoder used for rendering the project

Note that using a codec other than MP4 will cause the video to be unplayable in some devices using the Android player

If you are receiving the message This video cannot be played you should try using a third party video player like Rock Player " "

" " Determine the quality of the rendered video

A higher quality means more bitrate levels and a bigger file " "

" " Determine the frame rate of the rendered video

The frame-rate is very important in time-lapse videos, it will make your video slower or faster depending on what you want to archive

You can render multiple times with different frame-rates to see which is better in that situation " "

" "" Determine the camera shutter sound when capturing

If you don't want to hear the shutter noise when capturing, you can set this option as disabled.

If this option is set as disabled and you still hear the shutter you will need an alternative method for disabling it.

 Some phones have a security policy restriction about taking pictures silently, and in these cases the developer can't do much for that, but you can !

If your phone is rooted, in the folder /system/media/audio/ui/ you will find a sound file named camera_click.ogg, you should simple rename this file to camera_click.old and the camera shutter sound will be gone. "" "

" " Level of brightness during capture

At capture time the screen will be dimmed to preserve battery, here you can choose what will be the level of the screen brightness " "

" "" Lapse It was developed to provide you a easy way to create astonishing time-lapses right on your mobile device. We made an effort to provide a professional user interface designed for both aesthetics and usability

We continue working in the project and we will continue to bring new features and better performance for the app.

If you like this apk and think that it is useful and worth a contribution for the developers work, tap the Lapse It Pro logo below to buy the Professional Version

 If you prefer to use the In-App Billing please press MENU key and select that option

 Remember that when you buy an application you are supporting it's further development, and that your feedback in Android Market is also very important, so don't forget to give some stars for Lapse It

Thank you
"" "

Use portrait mode for more options
"This just added feature allow you to insert a sound track in your time lapse clip, isn't that awesome?"

"We are constantly improving and adding new features to Lapse It, so please support our work purchasing the Professional version.
Thanks !"
Select the music and swipe the sound bar to move the start position.
You will have access to the following features and more
Capture using your camera maximum resolution and render in Full High Definition up to 1080p
Your videos will look even more amazing with our awesome built-in filters, including the famous Tilt-Shift effect and more
Set your clips on another level with this stunning feature, you can use any of your library songs as a sound track
Use your criativity without limitations with Lapse It Pro, you will have access to all features and without any kind of advertising
Supporting Lapse It for just U$ 1,99 will help us to keep adding new features and will get you all our future updates for free
